rows.label: soul04_P0101
rows.name:
Take the fight to them!
 Get in up close and personal!

rows.label: soul04_P0102
rows.name:
Contact! Can you stagger
 'em with a melee attack?

rows.label: soul04_P0103
rows.name:
A little melee sure would help
 morale right now!

rows.label: soul04_P0201
rows.name:
On my signal...
 Cover fire, NOW!

rows.label: soul04_P0202
rows.name:
Buff me up and we can
 turn the tide!

rows.label: soul04_P0203
rows.name:
Keep 'em weakened and
 watch for an opening!

rows.label: soul04_P0301
rows.name:
Hit 'em hard and fast with
 melee before they can react!

rows.label: soul04_P0302
rows.name:
Fire everything you've got!
 Let's raise some hell, soldier!

rows.label: soul04_P0303
rows.name: Deploy a tactical aura!

rows.label: soul04_P0401
rows.name:
Damn these wounds...
 Can you patch me up?

rows.label: soul04_P0402
rows.name:
Tch... Time to regroup!
 Gimme a buff, stat!

rows.label: soul04_P0403
rows.name:
I can fight through the pain
 if you buff me up!

rows.label: soul04_P0501
rows.name:
Guh! Well ain't this a real
 SNAFU... Medic!

rows.label: soul04_P0502
rows.name:
Well, crap... Can I get some
 healing over here?!

rows.label: soul04_P0503
rows.name:
This? It's just a scratch!
 Buff me up!

rows.label: soul04_P0601
rows.name:
All right...Plan C!
 Hit 'em with melee!

rows.label: soul04_P0602
rows.name:
Don't let my death be in vain!
 Blast 'em to hell and back!

rows.label: soul04_P0603
rows.name:
You can still save the
 others... Use an aura!

rows.label: soul04_P0701
rows.name:
They sure take a beating...
 How about we get physical!

rows.label: soul04_P0702
rows.name:
Decimate them at range!
 Ready... FIRE!

rows.label: soul04_P0703
rows.name:
Weaken 'em now!
 They're sitting ducks!

rows.label: soul04_P0801
rows.name:
Gotcha! Now lay into 'em
 with melee attacks!

rows.label: soul04_P0802
rows.name:
The plan's working! Topple
 'em with ranged attacks!

rows.label: soul04_P0803
rows.name:
Weaken 'em now and they'll
 be vulnerable as heck!

rows.label: soul04_P0901
rows.name:
Hah! Let's pelt this SOB
 with bullets!

rows.label: soul04_P0902
rows.name:
Real big guy, huh?
 Nothing a buff can't fix!

rows.label: soul04_P0903
rows.name:
Use Overclock! Let's scare
 this goon into next Sunday!

rows.label: soul04_P1001
rows.name:
It's working! Bring it home
 with melee attacks!

rows.label: soul04_P1002
rows.name:
Not so nimble now, are ya?
 Blast 'em into Swiss cheese!

rows.label: soul04_P1003
rows.name:
Keep on weakening! Show
 'em the meaning of pain!

rows.label: soul04_P1101
rows.name:
We're doing it! Now you pitch
 in with an aura!

rows.label: soul04_P1102
rows.name:
Brace for enemy attack!
 Deploy those auras!

rows.label: soul04_P1103
rows.name:
That's it! Now fling out a buff
 to raise morale!

rows.label: soul04_P1201
rows.name:
Trample 'em with Overclock!
 On my lead...CHAAAARGE!

rows.label: soul04_P1202
rows.name:
Offense is the best defense!
 Blitz 'em with Overclock!

rows.label: soul04_P1203
rows.name:
I'll exploit their weakness!
 You get an aura going!

rows.label: soul04_C0101
rows.name:
Bogey down!
 Hit the next one with melee!

rows.label: soul04_C0102
rows.name:
Spray this small fry with
 whatever you got!

rows.label: soul04_C0103
rows.name:
Tough fight. Gimme a heal
 and lemme catch my breath!

rows.label: soul04_C0201
rows.name:
Pathetic! Now let's really
 humiliate 'em with an aura!

rows.label: soul04_C0202
rows.name:
I bought us some time!
 Wouldja kindly buff me up?

rows.label: soul04_C0203
rows.name:
Swoop right in!
 Don't let up the attack!

rows.label: soul04_C0301
rows.name:
We can hold out some more!
 Show me summa that melee!

rows.label: soul04_C0302
rows.name:
I took a chunk out of 'em!
 Put 'em to rest with bullets!

rows.label: soul04_C0303
rows.name:
That'll do it!
 Now batter 'em to a pulp!

rows.label: soul04_C0401
rows.name:
What is with this weather?
 Better buff up for the worst...

rows.label: soul04_C0402
rows.name:
Crappy weather...
 An aura should do us!

rows.label: soul04_C0403
rows.name:
The wind's on our side.
 Get 'em weakened!

rows.label: soul04_C0501
rows.name:
Battle report—I need support!
 Where's that buff?!

rows.label: soul04_C0502
rows.name:
Gonna need a buff to punch
 through this mess!

rows.label: soul04_C0503
rows.name:
You hit 'em with Overclock—
 I'll flank 'em!

rows.label: soul04_C0601
rows.name:
I'm good to go.
 Move in and clean up!

rows.label: soul04_C0602
rows.name:
Whew, close one! How 'bout
 some suppressive fire?

rows.label: soul04_C0603
rows.name:
What a champ! Now power
 us up with an aura!

rows.label: soul04_C0701
rows.name:
The gal's got guns! Think you
 could buff us up some more?

rows.label: soul04_C0702
rows.name:
Heh, peachy... How about
 a buff while we're at it?

rows.label: soul04_C0703
rows.name:
You worry about yourself!
 Use an aura!

rows.label: soul04_C0801
rows.name:
Let's teach these fools just
 how hard our melee hits!

rows.label: soul04_C0802
rows.name:
I'll keep going till I croak!
 Cover fire!

rows.label: soul04_C0803
rows.name:
You're on healing.
 I'm going in!

rows.label: soul04_C0901
rows.name:
Look at that idiot floundering
 down there! Blast away!

rows.label: soul04_C0902
rows.name:
Picking off that dolt now'll be
 a walk in the park!

rows.label: soul04_C0903
rows.name:
Sniper spot secured.
 Continue at range!

rows.label: soul04_C1001
rows.name:
Knock that SOB down with
 melee attacks!

rows.label: soul04_C1002
rows.name:
Don't let them get up!
 Fill 'em full of holes!

rows.label: soul04_C1003
rows.name:
Weaken them—we're goin'
 scorched earth here!

rows.label: soul04_C1101
rows.name:
I've stunned 'em! Turn
 them into a punching bag!

rows.label: soul04_C1102
rows.name:
I've stopped them in their
 tracks! Light 'em up!

rows.label: soul04_C1103
rows.name:
They've stopped moving!
 Now weaken their spirits!

rows.label: soul04_C1201
rows.name:
Look at this oaf sleeping.
 Give 'em a rude awakening!

rows.label: soul04_C1202
rows.name:
Aww, you tired? We'll blast
 you into an eternal sleep!

rows.label: soul04_C1203
rows.name:
Snoozing on the job?
 Nothing a whupping won't fix!

rows.label: soul04_C1301
rows.name:
Target acquired!
 Recommending CQC!

rows.label: soul04_C1302
rows.name:
We've got the upper hand!
 Pelt 'em with ranged attacks!

rows.label: soul04_C1303
rows.name:
You're going nowhere, pal.
 Give 'em a real walloping!

rows.label: soul04_C1401
rows.name:
Doll's totaled!
 I need repairs, stat!

rows.label: soul04_C1402
rows.name:
I'll take care of this!
 You use melee attacks!

rows.label: soul04_C1403
rows.name:
My Doll's nearly busted!
 Could use some cover fire!

rows.label: soul04_C1501
rows.name:
There goes our escape route!
 Heal, then engage!

rows.label: soul04_C1502
rows.name:
Aw, hell... I could really
 use a buff here!

rows.label: soul04_C1503
rows.name:
It's just a Doll! Give 'em a
 taste of Overclock!

rows.label: soul04_C1601
rows.name:
Gotta make this fuel count!
 Requesting buff!

rows.label: soul04_C1602
rows.name:
This thing guzzles fuel like
 crazy... Fix 'er up!

rows.label: soul04_C1603
rows.name:
I'm out of juice!
 Patch me up, quick!
